body: Who cares about task killing demon Lord if you have household chores tasks
Well I guess we can say that we found g(old)
Now this is the wholesomeness I needed in this time of horribleness.

Popping the cherry of a ridiculously attractive girl and promptly knocking her up in the same session? And then whining about marriage expenses, not being able to defeat the demon lord, and having to do housework? Guy doesn't know what he's got. He could do WAY worse than Aqua, dumb as she is. If he really wanted, he could hire butlers/servants to do housework for him as he goes off to kill the demon lord. I wouldn't regret knocking up a girl like Aqua at all.
Kazuma became the father of a demi god.
Geez... I give up. This character tag isn't actually correct, but I suppose it doesn't  all matter that much...
